docs.text: Biography Shaobo Cui now works as an algorithm engineer in DAMO Academy, Alibaba. Before that he obtained MSc in Computer Science from Tsinghua University(2019) and B.E and B.A from Beihang University(2016). His research interests include machine learning, natural language processing. His Email: his last name + his first name + 16 + AT + outlook.com Education Tsinghua University, M.S in Computer Science, Aug,2016 - Jul, 2019. Beihang University, B.E in Electrical Engineering and B.A(minor), Aug, 2012 - Jul, 2016. Papers Publications Context-to-Session Matching: Utilizing Whole Session for Response Selection in Information-Seeking Dialogue Systems Zhenxin Fu, Shaobo Cui , Mingyue Shang, Feng Ji, Dongyan Zhao, Haiqing Chen, Rui Yan. To appear in KDD, 2020 MTSS: Learn from Multiple Domain Teachers and Become a Multi-Domain Dialogue Expert Shuke Peng, Feng Ji, Zehao Lin, Shaobo Cui , Haiqing Chen, Yin Zhang AAAI, 2020. DAL: Dual Adversarial Learning for Open-Domain Dialogue Systems Shaobo Cui , Rongzhong Lian, Di Jiang, Yuanfeng Song, Siqi Bao, Yong Jiang NeuralGen workshop at NAACL-HLT, 2019. Improved Optimization Methods for Regularized Optimal Transport Shaobo Cui , Chaobing Song, and Yong Jiang ICTAI, 2017. Effective Lipschitz Constraint Enforcement for Wasserstein GAN Training Shaobo Cui , Yong Jiang ICCIA, 2017. Accelerated Stochastic Greedy Coordinate Descent by Soft Thresholding Projection onto Simplex Chaobing Song, Shaobo Cui , Yong Jiang, Shu-Tao Xia. NeurIPS, 2017. Pre-Print Should Answer Immediately or Wait for Further Information? A Novel Wait-or-Answer Task and Its Predictive Approach Zehao Lin, Shaobo Cui , Xiaoming Kang, Guodun Li, Feng Ji, Haiqing Chen, Yin Zhang arxiv Others Academic Service Reviewer of NAACL-HLT 2018, WWW 2019, ICML 2019, NeurIPS 2019, ACL 2020. PC member of AAAI 2020. Some Rewards or Honors National Scholarship for Undergraduate, 2013, 2014(two consecutive years). National Scholarship for Graduate Student, 2017. Outstanding Graduate of Beihang University, 2016. Outstanding Graduate for Master Student of Beijing City, 2019. Thesis Reward for Master student of Tsinghua University, 2019. Visiting Scholarship from Tsinghua-University - The University of Melbourne. Travel Grant Scholarship of NAACL-HLT, 2019. Academic Performance B.E in Beihang University: 89.9/90. Rank: 1/220. M.S in Tsinghua University: 4.0/4.0. Rank: 1/28.
